This move comes despite skepticism from Elon Musk regarding OpenAI's financial capabilities for such ambitious AI infrastructure plans. The Norwegian facility, named Stargate Norway, will utilize 100,000 NVIDIA GPUs and run entirely on renewable power, aiming to deliver 230MW of capacity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/chatgpt-maker-openai-expands-the-project-that-elon-musk-said-sam-altman-has-no-money-for-to-europe/articleshow/123024381.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/chatgpt-maker-openai-expands-the-project-that-elon-musk-said-sam-altman-has-no-money-for-to-europe/articleshow/123024381.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 21:12:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="18208" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123024383,imgsize-18208.cms"/></item><item><title>'The way she was tortured': Uma Bharti remembers Pragya Thakur, hails Malegaon verdict</title><description><![CDATA[Uma Bharti welcomed the Malegaon blast verdict. She insisted that terror has no colour. Bharti demanded an apology from Congress and Digvijay Singh. She criticized the 'Hindu terror' narrative. Bharti remembered Pragya Thakur and her suffering. She blamed political parties for 'Bhagwa terror' label. Bharti said those who fabricated lies must be punished.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/the-way-she-was-tortured-uma-bharti-remembers-pragya-thakurs-jail-time-hails-malegaon-blast-verdict/articleshow/123022280.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/the-way-she-was-tortured-uma-bharti-remembers-pragya-thakurs-jail-time-hails-malegaon-blast-verdict/articleshow/123022280.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 18:51:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1362311" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123022318,imgsize-1362311.cms"/></item><item><title>'Shouldn't have done that': Ex-India coach slams umpire Dharmasena — Watch</title><description><![CDATA[Former India batting coach Sanjay Bangar has criticised umpire Kumar Dharmasena for signaling an inside edge during the India-England Test, sparking debate. Bangar emphasised that Dharmasena's gesture, a habit from pre-DRS days, could influence the bowling team, undermining impartiality. India struggled, losing early wickets, including Shubman Gill's run-out, ending the session at 85/3 in their bid to level the series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/he-should-not-have-done-that-former-india-cricketer-slams-umpire-kumar-dharmasena-over-inside-edge-signal-watch/articleshow/123024525.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/he-should-not-have-done-that-former-india-cricketer-slams-umpire-kumar-dharmasena-over-inside-edge-signal-watch/articleshow/123024525.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 21:34:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="7612" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123024882,imgsize-7612.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump vows to help Pak tap 'massive oil reserves': How it compares to India - top points</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump announced a US-Pakistan deal to develop Pakistan's 'massive oil reserves,' even saying that India may be a potential buyer. Despite Pakistan's claims of coastal petroleum, extraction progress remains limited. Pakistan relies heavily on Middle Eastern oil imports, constituting 20% of its import expenses.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/donald-trump-to-help-pakistan-build-massive-oil-reserves-how-much-known-crude-oil-does-it-have-how-does-that-compare-to-india-top-points-to-know/articleshow/123023716.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/donald-trump-to-help-pakistan-build-massive-oil-reserves-how-much-known-crude-oil-does-it-have-how-does-that-compare-to-india-top-points-to-know/articleshow/123023716.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 20:13:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="108572" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123023776,imgsize-108572.cms"/></item><item><title>No one has accepted offer: Mira Murati on rejecting Zuckerberg’s $1 bn offer to join Meta AI</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's aggressive pursuit of AI talent faced a significant setback as Thinking Machines Lab, led by Mira Murati, reportedly rejected lucrative offers, some reaching a billion dollars, to join Meta's Superintelligence Lab. Police have initiated an investigation into the cause of the deaths, which remain unknown at this time. The children's mother is employed as a security guard at AIIMS Patna, while their father works in the Election Commission, according to authorities.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/patna-tragedy-ec-workers-children-burnt-to-death-in-janipur-charred-bodies-found-on-bed/articleshow/123022913.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/patna-tragedy-ec-workers-children-burnt-to-death-in-janipur-charred-bodies-found-on-bed/articleshow/123022913.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 19:46:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1018036" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123023230,imgsize-1018036.cms"/></item><item><title>Chad Johnson to ESPN? Johnson has already playfully auditioned for the position.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/will-chad-johnson-become-shannon-sharpes-successor-at-espn-after-the-super-bowl-winners-shocking-exit/articleshow/123025645.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/will-chad-johnson-become-shannon-sharpes-successor-at-espn-after-the-super-bowl-winners-shocking-exit/articleshow/123025645.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 22:28:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="54158" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123025655,imgsize-54158.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | 'Don’t know why he was upset': Ganguly on Gambhir-curator spat</title><description><![CDATA[Former captain Sourav Ganguly has downplayed the recent heated exchange between India's head coach Gautam Gambhir and Oval pitch curator Lee Fortis, emphasising that such disagreements are common in cricket. Benioff anticipates AI will fuel a surge in small business creation by democratizing access to enterprise-level tools.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/salesforce-ceo-marc-benioff-says-i-keep-asking-ceos-what-ai-are-they-using-for-these-big-layoffs-and-i-think-/articleshow/123014079.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/salesforce-ceo-marc-benioff-says-i-keep-asking-ceos-what-ai-are-they-using-for-these-big-layoffs-and-i-think-/articleshow/123014079.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 12:40:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="66660" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014070,imgsize-66660.cms"/></item><item><title>Kwame Brown fires shots: Gilbert Arenas’ arrest jab — Shannon Sharpe’s ESPN exit mocked</title><description><![CDATA[Gilbert Arenas' arrest for running an illegal gambling operation and Shannon Sharpe's departure from ESPN have stirred controversy. The wrestling world mourned the loss of the iconic figure. WWE paid tribute to Hogan on Monday Night Raw.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/how-did-hulk-hogan-die-official-cause-of-death-revealed-a-week-after-sudden-passing/articleshow/123024501.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/how-did-hulk-hogan-die-official-cause-of-death-revealed-a-week-after-sudden-passing/articleshow/123024501.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 21:19:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="703469" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123024494,imgsize-703469.cms"/></item><item><title>IIT Kharagpur moves to prevent suicides, removes ceiling fans, adds ‘Campus Mothers’</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/iit-kharagpur-moves-to-prevent-suicides-removes-ceiling-fans-adds-campus-mothers/articleshow/123022419.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/iit-kharagpur-moves-to-prevent-suicides-removes-ceiling-fans-adds-campus-mothers/articleshow/123022419.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 19:11:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39796" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123022602,imgsize-39796.cms"/></item><item><title>Shubman Gill's costly call: Run out after rain break halts India’s progress at The Oval - Watch</title><description><![CDATA[After a rain break, Shubman Gill's careless run-out disrupted India's progress in the fifth Test against England. Gill, who had looked good, was dismissed for 21 due to a poor decision, ending a promising partnership. Despite the setback, Gill surpassed Sunil Gavaskar's record for most runs by an Indian in a Test series, reaching 737 runs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-costly-call-run-out-after-rain-break-halts-indias-progress-at-the-oval-watch/articleshow/123023504.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-costly-call-run-out-after-rain-break-halts-indias-progress-at-the-oval-watch/articleshow/123023504.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 20:03:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="109082" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123023507,imgsize-109082.cms"/></item><item><title>Kidney health: How much water do you need to drink daily for healthy kidneys?</title><description><![CDATA[Water, essential for bodily functions and kidney health, requires nuanced intake based on individual factors like age, activity, and health conditions. Research links adequate hydration to reduced CKD risk, but overhydration can be harmful. Guidelines suggest 2.7-3.7 liters daily from all sources, with 1.5-2 liters of plain water recommended.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/kidney-health-how-much-water-do-you-need-to-drink-daily-for-healthy-kidneys/articleshow/123013940.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/kidney-health-how-much-water-do-you-need-to-drink-daily-for-healthy-kidneys/articleshow/123013940.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 19:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40356" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014037,imgsize-40356.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | Abhimanyu Easwaran's father breaks silence: 'I don't understand...'</title><description><![CDATA[Abhimanyu Easwaran's wait for his India Test debut extends to 961 days, sparking criticism from his father, Ranganathan, and former coach Arun Lal. Despite consistent performances, Easwaran was overlooked for the fifth Test against England, while Karun Nair received a chance. Ranganathan expressed his son's disappointment, questioning selection criteria favoring IPL performances over Ranji Trophy success.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-abhimanyu-easwarans-father-breaks-silence-on-sons-never-ending-wait-i-dont-understand-/articleshow/123022819.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-abhimanyu-easwarans-father-breaks-silence-on-sons-never-ending-wait-i-dont-understand-/articleshow/123022819.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 19:24:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARNAB MUKHERJI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="173130" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123022816,imgsize-173130.cms"/></item><item><title>Malegaon blast case: Court says 'no reliable proof' - why all 7 accused were let off</title><description><![CDATA[A special NIA court acquitted Sadhvi Pragya Singh Thakur, Prasad Purohit, and five others in the 2008 Malegaon blast case, citing lack of evidence and procedural lapses. The court stated that the UAPA could not be applied due to defective sanction orders and noted the prosecution failed to prove key evidence. Families of the deceased will receive compensation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2008-malegaon-blast-case-court-says-no-reliable-proof-to-warrant-conviction-heres-why-all-7-accused-were-let-off/articleshow/123014240.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2008-malegaon-blast-case-court-says-no-reliable-proof-to-warrant-conviction-heres-why-all-7-accused-were-let-off/articleshow/123014240.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:29:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1880623" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123015068,imgsize-1880623.cms"/></item><item><title>Patrick Mahomes’ mom Randi shares a tearful truth as her youngest steps into a new world</title><description><![CDATA[Randi Mahomes is experiencing a mix of emotions as her youngest daughter, Mia, prepares for high school. Randi is focused on equipping Mia with resilience and the wisdom to navigate challenges while prioritizing her emotional well-being. Dwyane Wade also commented on the post. The video received love from fans and family. Kaavia is the inspiration for Gabrielle Union's book, Shady Baby. The book became a New York Times bestseller. Gabrielle and Dwyane often talk about their parenting style. They inspire others on various platforms.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-melts-hearts-with-video-recapping-their-daughter-kaavias-growing-years/articleshow/123016677.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-melts-hearts-with-video-recapping-their-daughter-kaavias-growing-years/articleshow/123016677.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1819815" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123020288,imgsize-1819815.cms"/></item><item><title>'Busy day' at White House: 25% tariff on India, 'dead economies' jibe, deal with Pak & more</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump unveiled a series of trade actions, imposing a 25% tariff and penalties on Indian goods due to trade imbalances and ties with Russia. Simultaneously, he offered to collaborate with Pakistan on oil development, hinting at potential future exports to India. Trump also announced trade measures against Brazil and South Korea, while criticizing Canada's stance on Palestinian statehood.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/busy-day-at-white-house-25-tariff-on-india-dead-economies-jibe-trade-deal-with-pakistan-more-key-points/articleshow/123011589.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/busy-day-at-white-house-25-tariff-on-india-dead-economies-jibe-trade-deal-with-pakistan-more-key-points/articleshow/123011589.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 11:04:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="960207" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123011903,imgsize-960207.cms"/></item><item><title>961 days of wait: Easwaran warms the bench as others race ahead of him</title><description><![CDATA[Abhimanyu Easwaran's wait for his Test debut extends beyond 961 days, despite multiple call-ups and team tours. While 15 other players have debuted since his initial selection, Easwaran remains a reserve, witnessing leadership changes and younger players being preferred. His patience is being tested, having been part of major Test series without getting a chance to play.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/961-days-of-wait-abhimanyu-easwaran-warms-the-bench-as-others-race-ahead-of-him/articleshow/123018415.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/961-days-of-wait-abhimanyu-easwaran-warms-the-bench-as-others-race-ahead-of-him/articleshow/123018415.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:10:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28360" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123018535,imgsize-28360.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[PB Fintech Q1 Results | Net profit jumps 40% to ₹85 crore; insurance premium surges 36%]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/pb-fintech-share-price-q1-results-net-profit-jumps-40-to-rs-85-crore-insurance-premium-surges-36-19646950.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[PB Fintech reported a total insurance premium of ₹6,616 crore for the first quarter, marking a 36% year-on-year growth, driven primarily by a 65% increase in online new health insurance. Core insurance revenue rose 37% year-on-year, while core credit revenue declined by 22%. Shares of PB Fintech Ltd ended at ₹1,812.45, down by ₹9.95 or 0.55% on the BSE.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Another worrying finding was that only 20% of Indian companies provided routine health screening to employees.       <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University.       <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK.     <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[PayPal has announced a new platform called ‘PayPal World’ to link several major payment systems and digital wallets.       <title><![CDATA[UK competition watchdog proposes ‘Strategic Market Status’ designation for Apple and Google mobile platforms]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/uk-cma-strategic-market-status-apple-google-mobile-platforms-19642333.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Once designated, the CMA can impose conditions on the two big tech firms to change anticompetitive behaviour. The rules also require the companies to inform the CMA of mergers even if they do not meet notification thresholds under competition rules.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Tata Capital targets $20 billion valuation in upcoming IPO]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/tata-capital-ipo-valuation-raised-drhp-filing-19642326.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week. Tata Capital plans to raise around $2 billion through the IPO, which is expected to launch in the first half of September this year. The IPO is being driven by a regulatory mandate. In September 2022, the Reserve Bank of India classified Tata Capital as an upper-layer systemically important NBFC, requiring it to go public within three years. That deadline expires this September.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Wed, 23 Jul 2025 19:50:21 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
